msContents.textLang: Chiefly in German, 2 letters and some quotations in Italian.

note.q: Handwritten notes and corrections throughout the letters. Includes a list of names. Includes a copy of a letter from Bunsen and Kestner to Gerhard and Panofka, forwarded from Gerhard to Braun. Includes a copy of a letter from Gerhard to Bunsen, forwarded from Gerhard to Braun. Includes a letter signed by HÃ¤rtel to Braun.
